step_description: a VI1 document issued in the country of origin for each shipment.
step_howto_description: A VI1 is a document issued in a Third Country of origin giving a description and analysis details for wines imported into the European Community. It is issued by a Third Country authority as shown on a list published by the European Commission.
question_option_hint_text: VI-1 documents are needed for importing wine from a third country
